column2:
united_tbl <- TextAnalysisR::unite_text_cols(df, listed_vars = c("AB", "DE", "TI"))

tokens <- TextAnalysisR::preprocess_texts(united_tbl,
                                          text_field = "united_texts",
                                          min_char = 2,
                                          remove_punct = TRUE,
                                          remove_symbols = TRUE,
                                          remove_numbers = TRUE,
                                          remove_url = TRUE,
                                          remove_separators = TRUE,
                                          split_hyphens = TRUE,
                                          split_tags = TRUE,
                                          include_docvars = TRUE,
                                          keep_acronyms = FALSE,
                                          padding = FALSE,
                                          verbose = FALSE)
